2019-08-14.name: Annyeong, Tirano
2019-08-14.desc:
The world's greatest exposition of the pirates, by the pirates, for the pirates - the Pirates Festival. Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat Crew receive an invitation from its host Buena Festa who is known as the Master of Festivities. They arrive to find a venue packed with glamorous pavilions and many pirates including the ones from the Worst Generation. The place is electric.

Source: Fuji TV

2019-08-23.name: Hero Mask (2019)
2019-08-23.desc:
* Based on a fantasy comic book series by LeSean Thomas.

Immortal renegade Philly the Kid and his transforming pink Cadillac join a relentlessly upbeat friendship droid on her quest to find a missing prince.

Source: netflix

2019-08-30.name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Kurenai Densetsu
2019-08-30.desc: * Based on Level-5's Ni no Kuni video game franchise.
